net.sf.gogui.thumbnail
Class ThumbnailCreator

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.gogui.thumbnail.ThumbnailCreator

public final class ThumbnailCreator
extends java.lang.Object

Thumbnail creator. Creates thumbnails according to the freedesktop.org standard.

Method Detail

create

public void create(java.io.File input)
            throws ErrorMessage
Create thumbnail at standard location. Does not create the thumnbail if an up-to-date thumbnail already exists.

Throws:
ErrorMessage

create

public void create(java.io.File input,
                   java.io.File output,
                   int thumbnailSize,
                   boolean scale)
            throws ErrorMessage
Create thumbnail.

Parameters:
input - The SGF file
output - The output thumbnail. Null for standard filename in .thumbnails/normal
thumbnailSize - The image size of the thumbnail.
scale - If true thumbnailSize will be scaled down for boards smaller than 19.
Throws:
ErrorMessage
